ai-ja467:1.2_0: But if you succeeds in them,
ai-ja467:1.3_0: he is joyful, there is happiness,
ai-ja467:2.2_0: But if you succeeds in them,
ai-ja467:2.3_0: Then he has another sensual pleasures.
ai-ja467:2.4_0: like a cave, he looks for craving.
ai-ja467:3.2_0: As she was growing in her increased,
ai-ja467:3.3_0: that’s how it is, see people
ai-ja467:3.6_0: As she was growing in her increased,
ai-ja467:4.2_0: I’ll serve a slave of a bondservant.
ai-ja467:4.3_0: It is not enough for one to give it away,
ai-ja467:4.4_0: Knowing this, live a moral life.
ai-ja467:5.1_0: A King, having forcibly conquered the whole
ai-ja467:5.2_0: ruling the land from sea to sea,
ai-ja467:5.3_0: unsatisfied with the near shore of the ocean,
ai-ja467:5.4_0: would still yearn for the further shore.
ai-ja467:6.1_0: So long as I recollect sensual pleasures
ai-ja467:6.2_0: mind finds no footing in the mind.
ai-ja467:6.3_0: Then, when you see your work,
ai-ja467:6.4_0: they are satisfied who are satisfied with wisdom.
ai-ja467:7.1_0: The best is the best of wisdom,
ai-ja467:7.3_0: The person with wisdom is seen as a person.
ai-ja467:8.1_0: For the one withcified sense desires, ~ the aggregates,
ai-ja467:8.3_0: A person is like the ocean,
ai-ja467:9.3_0: With the giving up of sensual pleasures
ai-ja467:9.4_0: that’s what is reckoned as happiness.
ai-ja467:9.5_0: If you wish to complete happiness,
ai-ja467:12.2_0: a sage gone beyond all worlds,
ai-ja467:12.3_0: I’m the one who cuts off craving.
